thread.title: Microsoft, Gaming and Libations 23 — Watch and win Minecraft: Pocket Edition for Windows 10 Mobile tonight!
thread.title_full: Microsoft, Gaming and Libations 23 — Watch and win Minecraft: Pocket Edition for Windows 10 Mobile tonight!

author: Daniel Rubino
title: Microsoft, Gaming and Libations 23 — Watch and win Minecraft: Pocket Edition for Windows 10 Mobile tonight!
text:
Join us for Microsoft, Gaming and Libations tonight LIVE on Beam, and you could win stuff!
Microsoft, Gaming and Libations is a live show hosted on Microsoft's streaming network, Beam.pro, featuring Jez Corden, Zac Bowden, and Daniel Rubino from Windows Central. Tonight, we'll be playing Minecraft: Pocket Edition to celebrate its launch on Windows 10 Mobile , giving away TEN copies.
